Title: Gnumeric: Heap overflow in the included PCRE library
Synopsis:
Gnumeric is vulnerable to a heap overflow, possibly leading to the
    execution of arbitrary code.

Background.Text: The Gnumeric spreadsheet is a versatile application developed as part of the GNOME Office project. libpcre is a library providing functions for Perl-compatible regular expressions.

Description.Text: Gnumeric contains a private copy of libpcre which is subject to an integer overflow leading to a heap overflow (see GLSA 200508-17).

Impact.Text: An attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability by tricking a user into opening a specially crafted spreadsheet, which could lead to the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running Gnumeric.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All Gnumeric users should upgrade to the latest version:
